game.name: Train Simulator: Western Maryland H-9 Class
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Return to the glorious age of steam railroading in the Allegheny Mountains with Machine Rail’s extraordinary Western Maryland H-9 class 2-8-0 built by The Baldwin Locomotive Works!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Return to the glorious age of steam railroading in the Allegheny Mountains with Machine Rail’s extraordinary Western Maryland H-9 class 2-8-0 built by The Baldwin Locomotive Works!
